sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT T.MLDZID, T.MLPHQC, T.DZMC, T.ZBX, T.ZBY,#bzdzxxbvo.dzzt# DZZT,T.XT_CJSJ,T.XT_HSSJ,T.XT_ZHXGSJ,T.BZ FROM $tableName$ WHERE 1=1
T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.SHZTDM = '01' AND T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.SHZTDM = '03' AND T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.XT_ZXBZ = '1'
(T.DMMC||T.MLPH||T.MLPHQC||T.DZMC||T.DZMCPY LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%' OR EXISTS(SELECT B.MLDZID FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZBMB B WHERE B.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND B.MLDZID = T.MLDZID AND B.DZBM LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%'))
T.FXJDM = #bzdzxxbvo.fxjdm#
T.PCSDM = #bzdzxxbvo.pcsdm#
T.ZRQDM = #bzdzxxbvo.zrqdm#
ORDER BY #order#)M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(MLDZID) FROM $tableName$ WHERE 1=1
T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.SHZTDM = '01' AND T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.SHZTDM = '03' AND T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.XT_ZXBZ = '1'
(T.DMMC||T.MLPH||T.MLPHQC||T.DZMC||T.DZMCPY LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%' OR EXISTS(SELECT B.MLDZID FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZBMB B WHERE B.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND B.MLDZID = T.MLDZID AND B.DZBM LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%'))
T.FXJDM = #bzdzxxbvo.fxjdm#
T.PCSDM = #bzdzxxbvo.pcsdm#
T.ZRQDM = #bzdzxxbvo.zrqdm#

SELECT T.MLDZID, T.XT_ZHXGRBM FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.MLPHQC = #mlphqc# AND T.XZQHDM = #xzqhdm# AND T.DMDM = #dmdm#
T.MLDZID != #mldzid#

SELECT T.JZWID FROM BZDZ_ADD_JZWGLB T WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.BZ = #bz#
AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
SELECT T.JZWID FROM BZDZ_ADD_JZWGLB T WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.BZ IS NULL AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#

sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT MLDZID,MLPHQC,DZMC,ZRQDM,(SELECT T.ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.ORGCODE = ZRQDM) ZRQMC, PCSDM,(SELECT T.ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.ORGCODE = PCSDM) PCSMC,SHZTDM,ZBX,ZBY,XT_CJSJ,XT_ZHXGSJ FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZSHB WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND SHZTDM = #bzdzxxbvo.shztdm#
(DMMC||MLPH||MLPHQC||DZMC||DZMCPY LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%')
FXJDM = #bzdzxxbvo.fxjdm#
PCSDM = #bzdzxxbvo.pcsdm#
ZRQDM = #bzdzxxbvo.zrqdm#
ORDER BY PCSDM)M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(MLDZID) FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZSHB WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND SHZTDM = #bzdzxxbvo.shztdm#
(DMMC||MLPH||MLPHQC||DZMC||DZMCPY LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%')
FXJDM = #bzdzxxbvo.fxjdm#
PCSDM = #bzdzxxbvo.pcsdm#
ZRQDM = #bzdzxxbvo.zrqdm#
SELECT T.ORGCODE ZZJGDM, T.ORGNAME ZZJGMC, T.BJZBZ BJZBZ FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.ORGCODE = #zzjgdm#

SELECT T.*,(SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = SQDM) SQMC, (SELECT BJZBZ FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = ZRQDM) BJZBZ, (SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = ZRQDM) ZRQMC, (SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = PCSDM) PCSMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZSHB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
SELECT T.DZBMID, T.DZBM FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZBMB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDHSB
ZBX = #zbx#
ZBY = #zby#
XT_ZXBZ = #xt_zxbz#
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ IS NULL AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDHSB
ZBX = #zbx#
ZBY = #zby#
XT_ZXBZ = #xt_zxbz#
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ IS NULL AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_MLDZSHB
SHRXM = #shrxm#
SHRID = #shrid#
SHSJ = #shsj#
SHDWMC = #shdwmc#
SHDWDM = #shdwdm#
SHZTDM = #shztdm#
SHBHGYY = #shbhgyy#
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZSHB
SHRXM = #shrxm#
SHRID = #shrid#
SHSJ = #shsj#
SHDWMC = #shdwmc#
SHDWDM = #shdwdm#
SHZTDM = #shztdm#
SHBHGYY = #shbhgyy#
DZMC = REPLACE(DZMC,#chdzmc#,#dzmc#)
DZMCPY = REPLACE(DZMCPY,#chdzmcpy#,#dzmcpy#)
DZMCPWD = REPLACE(DZMCPWD,#chdzmcpwd#,#dzmcpwd#)
DZMCPYPWD = REPLACE(DZMCPYPWD,#chdzmcpypwd#,#dzmcpypwd#)
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB
DZMC = REPLACE(DZMC,#chdzmc#,#dzmc#)
DZMCPY = REPLACE(DZMCPY,#chdzmcpy#,#dzmcpy#)
DZMCPWD = REPLACE(DZMCPWD,#chdzmcpwd#,#dzmcpwd#)
DZMCPYPWD = REPLACE(DZMCPYPWD,#chdzmcpypwd#,#dzmcpypwd#)
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB("MLDZID","XZQHDM","DMDM","DMMC","SQDM","ZRQDM","PCSDM","FXJDM","MLPHQZ","MLPH","MLPHHZ","MLPHQC","DZMC", "DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","ZBX","ZBY","BZ","XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP", "XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID","XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY","DTCWFK") SELECT "MLDZID","XZQHDM","DMDM","DMMC","SQDM","ZRQDM","PCSDM","FXJDM","MLPHQZ","MLPH","MLPHHZ","MLPHQC","DZMC", "DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","ZBX","ZBY","BZ","XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP", "XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID","XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY","DTCWFK" FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZSHB WHERE XT_ZXBZ='0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB("CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY") SELECT "CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY" FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZSHB WHERE XT_ZXBZ='0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB("MLDZID","XZQHDM","DMDM","DMMC","SQDM","ZRQDM","PCSDM","FXJDM","MLPHQZ","MLPH","MLPHHZ","MLPHQC","DZMC", "DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","ZBX","ZBY","BZ","XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP", "XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID","XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY","DTCWFK") SELECT "MLDZID","XZQHDM","DMDM","DMMC","SQDM","ZRQDM","PCSDM","FXJDM","MLPHQZ","MLPH","MLPHHZ","MLPHQC","DZMC", "DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","ZBX","ZBY","BZ","XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP", "XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID","XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY","DTCWFK" FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDHSB WHERE XT_ZXBZ='0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB("CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY") SELECT "CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY" FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDHSB WHERE XT_ZXBZ='0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_CHDZSHB("CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY") SELECT "CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY" FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB WHERE XT_ZXBZ='0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.JZWID, T.DYH, T.ZDLCS, T.ZDHS, T.LX AS DYHLX FROM BZDZ_ADD_JZWCHJGB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.BZ IS NULL
T.BZ IS NOT NULL
AND T.DYDZBS = #mldzid#
SELECT T.CHDZID,T.DYH, T.DYHLX, T.LCH, T.SH, T.SHMC, T.SHBS, T.DZMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZSHB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DZJB = '4' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid# ORDER BY T.DZMC
SELECT T.CHDZID,T.DYH, T.DYHLX, T.LCH, T.SH, T.SHMC, T.SHBS, T.DZMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DZJB = '4' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid# ORDER BY T.DZMC
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDHSB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ IS NULL AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.*,(SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = SQDM) SQMC, (SELECT BJZBZ FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = ZRQDM) BJZBZ, (SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = ZRQDM) ZRQMC, (SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = PCSDM) PCSMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
SELECT * FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZSHB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_MLDZSHB
XZQHDM = #xzqhdm#
DMDM = #dmdm#
DMMC = #dmmc#
SQDM = #sqdm#
ZRQDM = #zrqdm#
PCSDM = #pcsdm#
FXJDM = #fxjdm#
MLPHQZ = #mlphqz#
MLPH = #mlph#
MLPHHZ = #mlphhz#
MLPHQC = #mlphqc#
DZMC = #dzmc#
DZMCPY = #dzmcpy#
DZMCPWD = #dzmcpwd#
DZMCPYPWD = #dzmcpypwd#
ZBX = #zbx#
ZBY = #zby#
BZ = #bz#
SHZTDM = #shztdm#
DTCWFK = #dtcwfk#
, SHBHGYY = #shbhgyy# ,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE BZDZ_ADD_MLDZBMB WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_MLDZRZB("RZID","MLDZID","XZQHDM","DMDM","DMMC","SQDM","ZRQDM","PCSDM","FXJDM","MLPHQZ","MLPH","MLPHHZ","MLPHQC","DZMC", "DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","ZBX","ZBY","BZ","XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP", "XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID","XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY","DTCWFK") SELECT #rzid#,"MLDZID","XZQHDM","DMDM","DMMC","SQDM","ZRQDM","PCSDM","FXJDM","MLPHQZ","MLPH","MLPHHZ","MLPHQC","DZMC", "DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","ZBX","ZBY","BZ","XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP", "XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID","XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY","DTCWFK" FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB WHERE XT_ZXBZ='0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_CHDZRZB("RZID","CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY") SELECT SYS_GUID(),"CHDZID","MLDZID","DYH","DYHLX","LCH","SH","SHMC","SHBS","DZMC","DZMCPY","DZMCPWD","DZMCPYPWD","DZJB","ZBX","ZBY", "XT_CJSJ","XT_HSSJ","XT_LRBZ","XT_LRSJ","XT_LRRXM","XT_LRRID","XT_LRRBM","XT_LRRBMID","XT_LRIP","XT_ZHXGSJ","XT_ZHXGRXM","XT_ZHXGRID", "XT_ZHXGRBM","XT_ZHXGRBMID","XT_ZHXGIP","XT_ZXBZ","XT_ZXYY" FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB WHERE MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB
,bz = #bz#
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB
SHBS = #shbs#
DYH = #newdyh#
DZMC = #chdzmc#
DZMCPY = #chdzmcpy#
DZMCPWD = #chdzmcpwd#
DZMCPYPWD = #chdzmcpypwd#
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND CHDZID = #chdzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB
SHBS = '' ,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND CHDZID = #chdzid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.* FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DYHLX = #dyhlx# AND T.DYH = #dyh# AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_JZWCHJGB
DYH = #newdyh#
ZDLCS = #newlcs#
ZDHS = #newhs#
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND LX = #dyhlx# AND DYH = #dyh# AND DYDZBS = #mldzid#

sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND LCH > #newlcs# AND DYHLX = #dyhlx# AND DYH = #dyh# AND MLDZID = #mldzid#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DZJB = '4' AND SH > #newhs#
LCH = #lch#
AND DYHLX = #dyhlx# AND DYH = #dyh# AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ',' || TO_CHAR(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(T.SH)) || ',' SH FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DYH = #dyh# AND T.DYHLX = #dyhlx# AND T.LCH = #lch# AND T.DZJB = '4' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB
SH = #newsh#
SHMC = #shmc#
DZMC = #chdzmc#
DZMCPY = #chdzmcpy#
DZMCPWD = #chdzmcpwd#
DZMCPYPWD = #chdzmcpypwd#
,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DZJB = '4' AND SH = #sh# AND DYH = #dyh# AND DYHLX = #dyhlx# AND LCH = #lch# AND MLDZID = #mldzid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT M.XZQHDM AS HJD_XZQHDM, T.CHDZID AS HJD_DZID, T.DZMC AS HJD_DZXZ, M.MLDZID AS HJD_MLPDM, M.DZMC AS HJD_MLPXZ FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB T, BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB M WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND M.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DZJB = '4' AND T.DZMC LIKE '%集体空挂%' AND T.MLDZID = M.MLDZID AND M.ZRQDM = #zrqdm# AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT M.XZQHDM AS HJD_XZQHDM, T.CHDZID AS HJD_DZID, T.DZMC AS HJD_DZXZ, M.MLDZID AS HJD_MLPDM, M.DZMC AS HJD_MLPXZ FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB T, BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB M WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND M.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DZJB = '4' AND T.DZMC LIKE '%居民空挂%' AND T.MLDZID = M.MLDZID AND M.ZRQDM = #zrqdm# AND ROWNUM = 1
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE $tableMlName$ t
DMMC = #entity.dmmc#, MLPHQC = REPLACE(T.MLPHQC, T.DMMC, #entity.dmmc#), DZMC = REPLACE(T.DZMC, T.DMMC, #entity.dmmc#), DZMCPY = REPLACE(T.DZMCPY,F_GETPYSZM(T.DMMC),F_GETPYSZM(#entity.dmmc#)), DZMCPWD = REPLACE(T.DZMCPWD,F_GETPWD(T.DMMC),F_GETPWD(#entity.dmmc#)), DZMCPYPWD = REPLACE(T.DZMCPYPWD, F_GETPWD(F_GETPYSZM(T.DMMC)),F_GETPWD(F_GETPYSZM(#entity.dmmc#))),
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DMDM = #entity.dmdm#

UPDATE $tableChName$ t
DZMC = REPLACE(T.DZMC, #entity.olddmmc#, #entity.dmmc#), DZMCPY = REPLACE(T.DZMCPY,F_GETPYSZM(#entity.olddmmc#),F_GETPYSZM(#entity.dmmc#)), DZMCPWD = REPLACE(T.DZMCPWD,F_GETPWD(#entity.olddmmc#),F_GETPWD(#entity.dmmc#)), DZMCPYPWD = REPLACE(T.DZMCPYPWD, F_GETPWD(F_GETPYSZM(#olddmmc#)),F_GETPWD(F_GETPYSZM(#entity.dmmc#))),
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND MLDZID IN (SELECT MLDZID FROM $tableMlName$ WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DMDM = #entity.dmdm#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT MLDZID AS ID,DZMC AS TEXT,FXJDM AS DZFXJDM,PCSDM AS DZPCSDM,ZRQDM AS DZZRQDM,XZQHDM AS DZXZQH,DMDM AS DZJLXDM,DMMC AS DZJLXMC, ZBX AS DZZBX,ZBY AS DZZBY FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0'
$queryExpression$
XZQHDM = #xzqh#
DMDM = #jlxdm#
and rownum <= 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CHDZID AS ID,(DYH || '-' || SHMC) AS TEXT FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DZJB = '4' AND MLDZID = #id#
(DYH || '-' || SHMC) LIKE '%$searchKey$%'
ORDER BY TEXT) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT D.*, DECODE(CZ.CZRKNUM, NULL, 0, CZ.CZRKNUM) AS CZRKNUM, DECODE(JZ.JZRKNUM, NULL, 0, JZ.JZRKNUM) AS JZRKNUM, DECODE(LD.LDRYNUM, NULL, 0, LD.LDRYNUM) AS LDRYNUM, DECODE(JW.JWRYNUM, NULL, 0, JW.JWRYNUM) AS JWRYNUM, DECODE(WLH.WLHRYNUM, NULL, 0, WLH.WLHRYNUM) AS WLHRYNUM, DECODE(DW.SYDWNUM, NULL, 0, DW.SYDWNUM) AS SYDWNUM FROM (SELECT T.CHDZID, T.DYH, T.DYHLX, T.LCH, T.SH, T.SHMC, T.SHBS, T.DZMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DZJB = '4' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid# ORDER BY T.DZMC) D LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(ID) CZRKNUM, T.JZD_DZID FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.SYRKYWLXDM = '1' AND T.JZD_MLPDM = #mldzid# GROUP BY T.JZD_DZID) CZ ON D.CHDZID = CZ.JZD_DZID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(ID) JZRKNUM, T.JZD_DZID FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.SYRKYWLXDM = '2' AND T.JZD_MLPDM = #mldzid# GROUP BY T.JZD_DZID) JZ ON D.CHDZID = JZ.JZD_DZID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(ID) LDRYNUM, T.JZD_DZID FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.SYRKYWLXDM = '3' AND T.JZD_MLPDM = #mldzid# GROUP BY T.JZD_DZID) LD ON D.CHDZID = LD.JZD_DZID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(ID) JWRYNUM, T.JZD_DZID FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.SYRKYWLXDM = '4' AND T.JZD_MLPDM = #mldzid# GROUP BY T.JZD_DZID) JW ON D.CHDZID = JW.JZD_DZID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(ID) WLHRYNUM, T.JZD_DZID FROM SYRK_SYRKXXZB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.SYRKYWLXDM = '5' AND T.JZD_MLPDM = #mldzid# GROUP BY T.JZD_DZID) WLH ON D.CHDZID = WLH.JZD_DZID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(T.ID) SYDWNUM, T.DZ_DWDZDM FROM DW_DWJBXXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DZ_DWDZMLPDM = #mldzid# GROUP BY T.DZ_DWDZDM) DW ON D.CHDZID = DW.DZ_DWDZDM

SELECT ZZ.*, DECODE(XJ.XJDZ, NULL, 0, XJ.XJDZ) AS XJDZ, DECODE(ZX.ZXDZ, NULL, 0, ZX.ZXDZ) AS ZXDZ, DECODE(YX.YXDZ, NULL, 0, YX.YXDZ) AS YXDZ FROM (SELECT T.ORGCODE, T.ORGNAME ,T.ORGLEVEL FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
AND T.ORGLEVEL = #orglevel# AND T.ORGCODE = #orgcode#
AND T.ORGLEVEL = '50' AND T.ORGCODE LIKE '%'||#gxpcs#||'%'
AND T.ORGLEVEL = '32' AND T.ORGCODE LIKE '%'||#gxsxj#||'%'
AND T.ORGLEVEL = '21' AND T.ORGBIZTYPE = '01'
) ZZ LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(T.MLDZID) AS XJDZ, $order$ FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB T WHERE 1=1
T.XT_CJSJ >= #kssj# AND T.XT_CJSJ < #jssj#
T.ZRQDM = #orgcode#
T.PCSDM = #orgcode#
T.FXJDM = #orgcode#
GROUP BY $order$) XJ ON ZZ.ORGCODE = XJ.$order$ LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(T.MLDZID) AS ZXDZ, $order$ FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '1'
T.XT_ZHXGSJ >= #kssj# AND T.XT_ZHXGSJ < #jssj#
T.ZRQDM = #orgcode#
T.PCSDM = #orgcode#
T.FXJDM = #orgcode#
GROUP BY $order$) ZX ON ZZ.ORGCODE = ZX.$order$ LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(T.MLDZID) AS YXDZ, $order$ FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.ZRQDM = #orgcode#
T.PCSDM = #orgcode#
T.FXJDM = #orgcode#
GROUP BY $order$) YX ON ZZ.ORGCODE = YX.$order$

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
AND T.ORGLEVEL = #orglevel# AND T.ORGCODE = #orgcode#
AND T.ORGLEVEL = '50' AND T.ORGCODE LIKE '%'||#gxpcs#||'%'
AND T.ORGLEVEL = '32' AND T.ORGCODE LIKE '%'||#gxsxj#||'%'
AND T.ORGLEVEL = '21' AND T.ORGBIZTYPE = '01'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT T.MLDZID, T.MLPHQC, T.DZMC, T.ZBX, T.ZBY,#bzdzxxbvo.dzzt# DZZT,T.XT_CJSJ,T.XT_HSSJ,T.XT_ZHXGSJ,T.BZ FROM $tableName$ WHERE 1=1
T.XT_ZXBZ IS NULL
T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.XT_ZXBZ = '1'
(T.DMMC||T.MLPH||T.MLPHQC||T.DZMC||T.DZMCPY LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%' OR EXISTS(SELECT B.MLDZID FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZBMB B WHERE B.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND B.MLDZID = T.MLDZID AND B.DZBM LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%'))
T.FXJDM = #bzdzxxbvo.fxjdm#
T.PCSDM = #bzdzxxbvo.pcsdm#
T.ZRQDM = #bzdzxxbvo.zrqdm#
ORDER BY #order#)M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(MLDZID) FROM $tableName$ WHERE 1=1
T.XT_ZXBZ IS NULL
T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
T.XT_ZXBZ = '1'
(T.DMMC||T.MLPH||T.MLPHQC||T.DZMC||T.DZMCPY LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%' OR EXISTS(SELECT B.MLDZID FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZBMB B WHERE B.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND B.MLDZID = T.MLDZID AND B.DZBM LIKE '%$bzdzxxbvo.dzmc$%'))
T.FXJDM = #bzdzxxbvo.fxjdm#
T.PCSDM = #bzdzxxbvo.pcsdm#
T.ZRQDM = #bzdzxxbvo.zrqdm#

SELECT T.*,(SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = SQDM) SQMC, (SELECT BJZBZ FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = ZRQDM) BJZBZ, (SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = ZRQDM) ZRQMC, (SELECT ORGNAME FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND ORGCODE = PCSDM) PCSMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDHSB T WHERE T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
T.XT_ZXBZ IS NULL
T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'

SELECT T.CHDZID,T.DYH, T.DYHLX, T.LCH, T.SH, T.SHMC, T.SHBS, T.DZMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_CHDZDHSB T WHERE T.DZJB = '4' AND T.MLDZID = #mldzid#
T.XT_ZXBZ IS NULL
T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
ORDER BY T.DZMC
